label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_007
content:
## 2024-09-08 Daily Operations Summary

- Unique source IPs: 1953
- Unique destination IPs: 5786

- Top protocol TCP percentage: 79.9
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 12.2
- ICMP percentage: 1.3
- Long lived flows greater than 1 hour: 70
- East-West traffic percentage: 59.7

### Dns Query Analysis

- DGA suspected domains: 5
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 2027

- Cache hit percentage: 85.9
- TXT record queries: 641
- PTR queries: 11558

  - ET MALWARE CnC Beacon Activity
  - GPL SNMP public access udp
- False positive rate percentage: 13.7

### Events

- IPS blocked 21 packets from 198.51.107.18: known scanner
- BGP route change: AS path prepend from ISP-A — investigated

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-08. 9162966 flows analyzed. 3705812 DNS queries. 431 IDS alerts (2 critical, 15 high). WAN avg 4.71/2.35 Gbps in/out. 0 BGP announcements.
